item.title: SALT: Singular Value Adaptation with Low-Rank Transformation
item.description: SALT: Fine-tuning SAM for medical images using Singular Value Adaptation with Low-Rank Transformation for efficient, robust segmentation.

item.title: BiMediX2: Bio-Medical EXpert LMM for Diverse Medical Modalities
item.description: BiMediX2, a bilingual medical expert LMM excels in diverse medical modalities.

item.title: PhysGame: Uncovering Physical Commonsense Violations in Gameplay Videos
item.description: PhysGame benchmark unveils video LLMs’ weaknesses in understanding physical commonsense from gameplay videos, prompting the creation of PhysVLM, a knowledge-enhanced model that outperforms existing mo…

item.title: From CISC to RISC: language-model guided assembly transpilation
item.description: A novel LLM-based transpiler, CRT, efficiently converts x86 assembly to ARM and RISC-V assembly, achieving high accuracy and significant performance improvements over existing virtualization methods.
